Finally, a man with my approach to covering! Hey, darling...can't you show what men are like to this Mejarian woman, who's barely seen one?
Barely clothed, bursting with pride, and he's got a sword! Kamina, you're a man after my own heart--and I hardly know any men.
Ooh, you're a handsome one...and blond, which is even better. I see you eyeing me up...
Hi there, sweetheart...what was your name again? I forgot it when I got lost in your beautiful blond hair.
I wasn't sure if men could pull off blonde hair the way women do...but you're living proof. I'll keep my eye on you...
Ah, here's what I've been looking for! A handsome blond man. Try not to sweep me off my feet, darling.
So, uh, Mister Bizarro, what's with your friend hanging in the background? Do men like to dress up in costume?
Why is your friend all dressed up in a mask, anyway? He's not cute like you, so he can't get away with being weird.
Hey, Mister Blonde, you're certainly an oddball. I'd say the strangest part is why you've got your friend dancing around in costume behind you.
Can you tell your little Killer Queen performance buddy to settle down, darling? He's not nearly as dashing as you are.

state.text: Well, Mr. Blonde, you've got a strange friend and a bizarre attitude, but...w-wait, what's in your pocket?
...OK, I just noticed how Killer over here has a hand in his pocket. Way to reinforce my stereotypes of men--now stay away from me!
Wha--u-ugh! I-I just noticed your pocket! How dare you try to seduce me! I fight men all the time--you stay away!
Oh, Kira, darling, I can't stop staring! Your gorgeous blonde hair, your broad chest, your--your--severed hand! Eek!

case.state: I see ~player~ has grown so desperate at the gender disparity in this game that they've turned to Kool-Aid Man for their fix.
...Listen, ~player~, I get that this game doesn't have too many men, but you're better than this. Pick a real character.
Doesn't bode well for your opinion of me that you'd stick me with this idiot, ~player~.
...Kool-Aid Man, huh, ~player~? That's...your choice? Are you sure?
Kool-Aid Man? ...Do I have to keep playing? If ~player~'s not gonna take this seriously, why should I?
You're really starved for some male players, aren't you, ~player~? Couldn't you pick, I don't know, Pit? 9S? Come on.
...What the hell am I looking at? Forget playing against, just...looking at.
...My beauty deserves better tablemates than this.
On the female side of things, we have the most beautiful woman on the roster. And on the male side of things, well...well.
So are you, uh, going to produce actual words at some point? Or is grunting and yelling all I can expect from a man?
...I mean, I tease men about being stupid, but did think they were capable of speech.
...It would seem men haven't quite evolved up to the point of grasping language. What a shame.
...You're really showing me new lows for male intelligence, Link. Grunt again if you agree.
Eep! O-oh, you can talk? B-but...why didn't you?
...So are you over your fear of women now? Is that what the grunting was all about?
Oh, you can talk. Did my beauty make you clam up, cutie?
Well, that solves that mystery. Come on and join us in the land of language like a civilized person.
Oh, good, you can talk. I had really lost all hope for men's intelligence for a while there.
Ack! Wha--o-oh, you're done screaming! Uh...OK.
Well, now! There's bizarre specimens, and then there's you. Are you a man or a woman?
I can't really pin down your sex, to be honest...or your species, for that matter.
Weren't you made in a lab? So were all Mejarians before our Famas carried us! ...But I'm not sure if you're a woman.
Way to go ahead and be the ultimate test of judging men vs. women. Gotta say, I'm stumped.
...Oh, you're one of those ann-drazza-nuss types, right? That's the word?
Mejarians get made in labs, too...but our Famas carry us. So maybe you're a man, then? Tarakkians are carried to term in labs...
Well, what do we have here? An adorable little cinnamon roll of a man, dressed up as an angel!
You are just the cutest little man I've ever seen! Hibiki's a little smaller, but he's got too much spunk to be cute.
Ohhh, you're so cute, Mr. Angel! I could just eat you up!
What's an adorable little man like you doing here, Pit? Sure you want to strip nude in front of these scary, hulking women?
You've got to tell me more about yourself, Pit! You're so damn shy...and I'm so curious!
Such a little motormouth, but it alllll clams up when I swing my gaze your way. I love having this effect on cute little boys!
Come on, Mr. Angel, don't be shy! I mean, it's cute, but I want to learn more about Earth men!
There's so much you could teach me about men, Pit...the men in my life always reject me. And you're so nonthreatening!
I can't get over how cute you are, honey...but seriously, what's with the angel outfit? Men are no angels.
Men have always struck as more beastly than angelic...which is fine by me. So why do you dress like one?
So, uh, I read about angels as a girl, but they were always women. Why are you dolled-up like one, anyway?
Do those wings detach? They look pretty convincing, and the rest of your angel outfit is pretty good. Why do you have that on, anyway?
Hey, hey, hey! Talk about a hunk...and he's not even wearing much! Perfect.
You look like you see a lot of physical action, hot stuff...can those big muscles toss me around?
A big hunk of a man with more muscles than brainpower? Just what I've been looking for.
You seem a little clueless about this game, handsome. Don't worry...I'll guide you along.
Ooh, I love blonde hair! And a blonde man is that much more fascinating. What's your story, Mister Student?
Going to school still, dear? I'm afraid I wasn't much of a student--do all the Earth girls fawn over your magnificent blonde hair?
How embarrassing that a man made it further in school than I did. But I can forgive that--blondes always put me in a good mood.
Omigosh, a blond man! Perfect for collecting seed--I could have a beautiful blonde daughter! You can take a day off from school, right?
Uh...you're kind of tall, I guess, but it doesn't look like you wash yourself much. Gross.
I know you're a man, but can't you put a little effort into your appearance? You look like you just rolled out of a gutter.
"Shaggy," huh? That'd be like if my nickname were "Gorgeous." Actually, I'll have to propose that next flight practice...
Gangly, unshaven, all around a mess. I'm starting to miss the clean-cut professionalism of the Tarakkian soldiers I know.
You're friends with that Buffy girl, right? Well...gonna seal the deal, or what?
Well, you don't look so bad for a man. Am I in competition with that Buffy woman?
Not to be too forward or anything, but I'm on the prowl for a good man...for reasons you'll know soon enough. Interested?
You're a pretty average-looking man. I can live with that...but I bet they don't make women like me where you come from.
Oh, an Earth car? I bet our engineer would love taking you apart...but for me, you're just so terribly antiquated.
Hoaaaagh...am I supposed to be blown away by this ratty old mechanical thing? All it does it puff out smoke and make noise...no grace at all.
Hm. I must say, a silly little gearbox chugging along just doesn't impress a pilot of a sleek, airborne fighter craft.
Am I supposed to be enamored with this antique Earth car? Even without my Dread, I'd prefer the quiet, hovering luxury of a Mejarian make.
Now, if you were an antique gun, my darling Barnette would be all over you. I'd have to pry her off so she'd pay attention to me...
I hope you don't think you're the first bald man I've met. Our navigator has a shaved head--a woman's hair is more important, anyway.
Well, I can certainly appreciate the cleanliness of a bald man. But don't expect to scrub down my body that easily.
"Mister Clean"? Well, that will be revealed over time. I know our bald prisoner has a very clean body himself...as do I.
Ugh. Aren't you a bit old to be playing this? Though if you have a wife, I'm curious how she seduced you.
Uhhh...I was looking for a young man's seed, thank you. Not one who's clearly got children already.
I generally expect a man to look me in the eye, you know. Aren't you supposed to be brave warrior types? Or am I too spoiled by our captive soldiers?
Aren't you a bit shy for a man, hiding under that mask? You're rather short and slender for a man, too, but you can't help that.
...Ew. Are you some kind of furry dog-man? Dogs may be cute, but I can't stand how gross they are, slobbering all over my legs.
My, my. Are you really going to play games with my heart, handsome? You won't even tell me your whole name...I'm Jura.
..."N." You really won't even tell us your name? I can't fall for a man I don't know a thing about.
Well, aren't you bombastic? I can appreciate a man with dramatic flair, but is it really over something as silly as cards?
My, men really put their heart and soul into everything, don't they? You even built a little card-holding contraption!
...Is this how older men speak on Earth? I was expecting some handsome, experienced gentleman, and I get a scowling sloucher in baggy clothes.
Well, aren't you charming? I see men lose their luster with age--the young men I know are sharp-dressed and stand up straight.
Well, it's not as if a shorty hasn't caught my attention before. I wonder if you'll impress me with your gumption as he has.
What a pushy little boy. Listen, "Supreme Leader," a Mejarian doesn't take orders from a man, understand?
Hey, a playful back-and-forth is one thing, but no man is my "Supreme Leader." I'm not even from this planet.

state.text: What have we here, but another fine male spec--h-hey! That's one of those explosive launchers men use! Stay away from me!
H-hey, what's the big idea? I've seen men on Tarak lug around those boxes, firing rockets at us!
Hello there, Mister--R-Rocket Launcher? Hey, what're you carrying that thing around for? Men try to blow us up enough back home!

case.state: Hello there, handsome. Is it true you're some kind of servant? I'll gladly allow a man to wait on me hand and foot.
I thought a man would be too proud to describe himself as a servant. By all means, serve me--doesn't my beauty deserve it?
Hmph. Normally I'd flirt with a man to check if your seed is worth my time, but I've got no patience for rudeness.
You...call men "gay"? Does that insult apply to women in love, as well? It's the natural way of things, as far as I'm concerned.
Oh, I don't understand what you're on about at all. You suck on men's rods, then insult them? What's wrong with men in love--or women?
Sucking on a man's tube...I've never considered that. Maybe it extracts their seed better than that penetration business...
...Do men like it when you put your mouth on their tube? I figured my vagina would feel softer, but maybe it makes collecting seed easier...
Ew. You're certainly not as pretty as the dolls I had as a girl. Don't tell me Earth girls have tea parties with creepy monsters.
...You're the sort of toy men play with as kids, right? I played with dolls of gorgeous women as a girl--and then became one, of course.
My, men aren't shy about going topless, are you? But you could stand to have a bit more bravado.
Hm. Cowardly trembling is not a good look for a man, even if he's got a nice chest to show off. Stand up straight, would you?
Hey, now, the occasional show of fear fits a woman's delicate nature. A man doing it is just weird.
Oh, dear. I know my beauty can be overwhelming, but this man started throwing his clothes off as soon as he saw me.
Hey, now. I know you're a man, but patience is a virtue. Don't throw off all your clothes without a good tease first.
What kind of a title is "Suction Cup Man"? I'm afraid to let you anywhere near my breasts.
I think I deserve an explanation for why you're called "Suction Cup Man" if I'll be stripping near you. My body is delicate, you know!
Can you stop waving your gun around like a lunatic? Honestly. I don't listen to my girlfriend's lectures on gun safety just to watch some man use them as a flyswatter!
Oh, my girlfriend would be having a meltdown, watching you disrespect an antique like that. You're going to blow your own head off if you keep playing charades with it drawn!
I don't even like guns, but I've learned enough from Barnette to know you're not handling that thing safely. Put it away!
You'd think a man would know to keep his gun holstered and his finger off the trigger. I guess women are smarter in every aspect...my girlfriend has a collection.
Oh, what's this? You're a more rugged man than I'm used to--and I hear you're a space traveler, too? It's a shame you're a little old for me.
What a pleasant surprise to meet another spacefarer, and a man at that. Say, you wouldn't happen to have any young, handsome companions, would you?
Why is it that every rogue spacefaring man we meet is old and grizzled? I'm too much of a gorgeous, delicate young thing for you.
Oh, dear. I know my beauty can be overwhelming, but this man started throwing his clothes off as soon as he saw me.
Hey, now. I know you're a man, but patience is a virtue. Don't throw off all your clothes without a good tease first.
Well, what do we have here? I figured Earth might have another blonde in form-fitting black, but not an Earth man. Of course, my dress isn't as tight around the butt.
Well, now! I see blonde hair and a tight black outfit is a universal sign of seduction--not just between planets, but between the genders!
Oh, another wiry young boy, like the man on our Dread team. He's gotten a bit more sun than you have, though--what possessed you to go outside and come here?
This looks like the first time you've been outside in a while, "Deimos." You're even blinking the light out of your eyes. Was it really strip poker that brought you out here?
My! Tall, handsome, stoic, and artistic--dressed in white. If you grew your hair out, you'd be just like the doctor we have aboard.
You have a good head on your shoulders, always asking questions and playing it cool. You remind me of Duero, our handsome young doctor--he likes to paint, too.
Quite the streak you had there. Was that beginner's luck, or do men actually understand how numbers work?
That took long enough. More male skin for me!
Don't get a big head over that streak, handsome. You still haven't even touched me.
Feeling good about yourself, ~name~? You have yet to beat a Mejarian woman...well, me, anyway.
So, not to call you a harlot or anything, Misato, but you seem awful interested in these men...so am I. How do you Earth girls get their attention?
Ooh, you seem pretty confident around these Earth men, Misato. From one woman to another, what's the secret to getting their attention?
You seem to be doing a better job flirting with these Earth men, Misato. Am I doing something wrong? I always seem to scare them!
Men just run away from me, usually...I thought they like being flirted with. Misato, you seem to get them!
The losses continue. I mean, you're a man, so I wasn't expecting much brainpower.
Still haven't lost, you know. Don't worry, I look for handsomeness in my men, not brainpower.
Still shaky on how poker works, ~name~? I know it's a lot of numbers for a man to keep track of.
Another step towards a wonderful little anatomy lesson.
Going to make it, ~name~? Are all the numbers and shapes overwhelming your primate brain?
I know I've lost my sword, ~name~, but you shouldn't get all cocky.
Just calm down, ~name~. Everything will be fine...for me.
I understand. You've never seen a Mejarian before--we tend to draw the eye.
Is this game getting to you, ~name~? Shall I ask them to turn down the heat?
Are men into feet? Can't think of why else you'd be so distracted.
Feeling sour about your bad luck? You can peek at my toes. Men like that, right?
Don't get down on yourself. You've lasted this long with your mental disability--being a man.
I know all my accessories are frustrating, ~name~, but do try to concentrate.
Can't bear to go on after that sleeves trickery, huh?
Tiny male brain all out of steam? Don't worry, there's handsomer men in my life already.
Are you just doing this to appease me? You're so sweet, ~name~! I like you.
Got anything witty to say? I hope so, because your cards aren't doing that for you.
Don't give out on me now, ~name~. You're closer to seeing me nude than you think!
Come on, now. What good is a man who can't fly steady down the stretch?
Focus, ~name~. You're on the golden road...and I don't mean my hair.
I knew men got distracted by large breasts, but come on, ~name~, get it together.
Oho. My master plan of distracting you with my gorgeous chest is well underway!
I'm not embarrassed, ~name~, so try not to embarrass yourself.
Can't you force this Mejarian to take off her tiny little thong? I mean, really.
You know, I'm offended. My beautiful outfit should have been more distracting than my body!
I just knew flipping my hair back would get to you. Can't focus anymore, Mr. Manly-Man?
Trouble focusing? Yeah, my hair is my super-secret weapon.
It's OK to be overwhelmed, ~name~. After a lifetime of boring Earth women, this alien woman from Mejare comes along and strips for you.
Is something distracting you, handsome? Something exotic, gorgeous, female, and masturbating?
Oh, come on, ~name~. I'm fairly certain Mejarian and Earth vaginas are the same. What are you staring at?
Don't you have a game to win, handsome? Or are you totally overcome by my beauty? It's so embarrassing!
My, my, my. Gearing up to join me, ~name~? I'm certainly in the mood to get some seed from you.
Keep going, ~name~...I want to see you nude, and what it'll do to me when I'm like this.
I don't know what to tell you, ~name~. I could understand losing this miserably if I were still playing, but...
Still enjoying your silly card game? Sure you're not unconsciously ready to join me down here?
Keep up the good work, ~name~. Shame you couldn't strip this much when I was masturbating, but I guess I'll have to live with purely rational analysis.
Really inconsiderate timing to suddenly strip a whole bunch, handsome. I've already finished--I can't just go again right away.
Quite the streak you had there. Was that beginner's luck, or do men actually understand how numbers work?
That took long enough. More male skin for me!
Don't get a big head over that streak, handsome. You still haven't even touched me.
Feeling good about yourself, ~name~? You have yet to beat a Mejarian woman.
Think that streak has changed my mind about men? Not quite...but keep it up.
Good show, ~name~. Got any more of that luck in you? I hope not, or I won't see the good stuff.
I'm still not impressed. How do I know you weren't just lucky?
Not bad at all for a man. But I've got a long way to go, and you just lost your momentum.
Never thought a man would keep me on my toes...or force me to expose them in the first place.
Finally put a dent in that lucky streak. One step closer to seeing you bare!
Come now, your luck can't last forever. I'm positively desperate to see your tube-thing.
If you want to see me naked, your streaks are going to have to last longer than that.
Didn't think a man had that kind of luck in him. I mean, if men were lucky, they'd be born women.
I do know one smart man--Duero, our doctor. And I'd say he's got better hair.
Hey hey. For a second there, a man was giving me a run for my money.
Not bad at all. I like looks, but maybe I'll have your baby so she's smart instead.
Really hanging around, huh, ~name~? Well, not enough to get me out of my dress!
Good work with that streak...but it wasn't enough to make me streak.
I have to hand it to you, ~name~. The men in my life are either terrible at cards or too serious to play them.
And you were soooo close to getting me out of my dress! But no, it's your turn again.
Do men frustrate easily? I hope so, because that streak could have saved you--and exposed me.
Stellar job keeping your focus, especially for a man. I know it can be hard with a gorgeous naked alien woman eyeing you up.
Can't seem to shake you at all, handsome. Maybe you're more into women's vaginas? Well, you'll need more luck to see mine.
Guess you're not a "breasts" sort of guy, to stay focused like that. But then, I'm not sure if any men care about breasts like Mejarians do.
I hope you're proud of your little lucky streak. I saw you staring with your beady little eyes, so I know it wasn't skill.
Can't believe a man has been hogging all my luck. Look how I'm forced to stand because of cruel fortune!
There's just no shaking an Earth man, is there? I guess you're all too used to naked women.
Perhaps my mistake in this distraction plan was thinking a nude woman was anything noteworthy to an Earth man...even one as beautiful as me.
Finally caught your eye to break the streak, did I? I knew the hair would finally wake up that mysterious libido of yours.
I really thought masturbating in front of a man would finally distract him, but I guess that Tarakkian competitiveness runs deep.
Any more lucky runs, ~name~? Not sure why you'd want them, when you could be masturbating with me instead.
Sure you don't want to just throw it all away and come join an exotic woman in self-pleasure, ~player~. Think about it.
Men are so physical and blunt. Why they'd be all proud of a poker winning streak is beyond me.
Teehee. I had a feeling masturbating in front of you might finally shake you up a bit.
Such fierce competitiveness from a man! I like that...maybe your seed is what I've been looking for.
You really know your cards, ~name~, lasting so long with a nude Jura Basil Elden nearby.
What made you finally lose after all that? The sinking realization that I'm planning to eat you with all my Mejarian sisters?
Men's minds will forever be a mystery to me. I get all naked and masturbate, and only after I finish does he finally lose. Must've been luck...
I won with that? This is gonna be a breeze.
I know damn well I shouldn't have won with that...you Earth people are never gonna see me naked.
Oh, wow. A high card is enough to beat you people? You'd better enjoy the way I look now.
...Yeah, listen. I've got more layers than it seems, so you'd better hope me winning with a high card was a fluke.
Guess I can always count on a man's brainpower to get me out of a bad situation.
Thanks for getting me out of that jam, sweetheart. Here's a little leg for your trouble.
Close shave for me. Thanks for taking the hit, honey.
Too close for comfort. But now I'm quite comfortable...too bad for you.
Seems you can always count on Earthlings to screw up their cards worse than you did.
That was a high card I had, so you really did me a favor, darling.
Did I ever tell you how sweet I've found Earthlings to be? Going and losing for me when I had such a bad hand...
Hah! And I had a high card. Dealer, you're just messing with me.
Yeah, yeah, I'll get started--wait, I didn't lose? I had a high card!
Damn it, I--wait, how did someone have worse than me? Oh, wow.
...I'm just not sure what to make of you anymore, Dealer. You give me trash, and the rest of them burning trash.
You just pissed away your best chance to get me out of my dress...or did you?
To think that for a second there, I was actually worried...actually, I shouldn't have been regardless.
Damn, do I have any accessories left? ...Wait, I won?
Good thing I still have my ch--wait, what?
Bad news, ~name~...that was the best chance you had for getting me out of this thing! Did you see my hand?
Oh, my! You threw the hand to let me keep my modesty? You are just the sweetest thing, ~name~!
Just when I thought the dress had to go, ~name~ comes to my rescue. You're so sweet!
The moment you've all been waiting f--oh. Well, uh, I won, but I guess I spoiled how I'm down to my dress now.
It's sweet of you to be saving me from my awful high-card hands, ~name~, but it's too little, too late.
Good to know someone on this table is still looking out for me, as I stand here in just my tiny thong.
I'd call you stupid for losing to my high card, but you did get me out of my dress...so it was probably a fluke.
Oh, ~name~...you saved me from removing my thong, but as you can see, my modesty is already in tatters.
Winning with a high card is certainly more reassuring than this tiny bit of fabric I've got around my hips.
Hoo...my life flashed before my eyes for a moment there. My sex life, that is.
I was actually worried for a second there. But then I remembered I could actually stand to relieve some tension...and now I'm all pent-up.
All I had was a high card...but apparently it was high enough.
Come on, all I had was a high card! Aren't you going to finish me off, ~name~?
Ooh, lookie here! A man has to strip!
Is that you, ~name~? Don't let me down, now.
You should know, ~name~, I'm very interested in men. You're a fascinating bunch.
Won't you please strip yourself for this poor, curious Mejarian woman? You're so exotic.
Just what I was hoping for. Women will always be there--right now, I want a new toy to play with.
Oh? I've always wondered if men really are another species.
A man has to strip? What a surprise.
That's the way. Let's get the men naked!
Oh, good. Male nudity is actually interesting.
So much easier than bugging one of our prisoners.
Pony up, ~name~! We're all waiting.
Hey, handsome. Make me happy and take off something good this time.
I'm scouting out a good man to get some seed from. Gonna prove yourself to be the one?
That exotic male body of yours better make up for your tiny little brain.
Look this way while you do it, ~name~. Any man can be interesting to me.
What is it that makes men so fascinating? The way they lumber around this delicate universe of ours?
Hibiki's so adorable. I couldn't bring him here; he'd be all bent out of shape at this point.
Stay sharp, ~name~. You know, if men are capable of that.
A man lost. What a stunning turn of events.
Hey, ~name~. I know a charismatic shorty, a handsome doctor, and a goofball cadet. Where do you stack up?
No different than your average Tarakkian outpost raid.
Get a move on, ~name~. Every bit of skin you show is a new experience for me!
Your turn, ~name~. I'm all worked up, so make it something good.
Feel free to match me, in whatever way a man might do that.
You're already braver than most Tarakkians. One look at my chest and they'd be running for the hills.
Watch out, ~name~. Your organs are looking pretty tasty.
Hey, ~name~. Watch the cards, why don't you?
Just what am I gonna do with you? Can't even focus with a nude woman around.
Eyes on the prize, ~name~. You know, me.
Hey, I've handled tougher men than you. Soldiers are bred pretty strong on Tarak, and their guns make such a racket.
By all means, ~name~. Who knows what my instincts will do?
Here's your chance to pry me away from a lifetime of women.
Hey, ~name~, show me something I won't know how to react to.
Anything you've got that books can't teach me, ~name~?
Feeling amped-up after the show I put on for you, ~name~?
You just couldn't resist taking something off after my little demonstration, huh, ~name~?
Only slightly more exciting than my daily life of piloting, pirating, and planet-saving heroics.
Too bad I couldn't masturbate to whatever you'll be showing me now. But the biologist in me is still curious.
I come from a world of all women, so you're nothing special to me. But you are very cute, so I've got my eye on you, Missy.
And who's this tight-lipped specimen? "~player~"? If you say so...cutie.
Yet another woman? Like a drop in the bucket for a Mejarian...but even still, you're far cuter than I expected for an Earth girl.
You're a little more simply-dressed than the exotic types that seem to frequent this place, myself included. But you sure have a cute face!
And who are you, ~player~? You've barely said a thing...but you can admire my beauty too, if you want!
More runs like that, and you'd have a spot on our pilot team. You're always scouting for new recruits, right, Meia?
You've got the ferocity of Mejarian soldiers. Too bad I know how to handle them.
Hey, keep it up. Meia loves women that can put up a fight.
Don't give out on us now, dear! I was starting to come around on Earth women.
Good work, not getting all distracted by my beauty. Bit of a blow to the ego, though.
You had a streak going. You're one step closer to streaking yourself, though.
Nice little lucky run. Luck's a good trait in a pilot...and in a lover.
This Earth girl's got some skill, lasting so long. Do we have any piloting spots open, Meia?
What incredible poker skills to last so long. Only problem: this is strip poker, and the objective is to masturbate and have fun.
Yeah, yeah, ~player~, enjoy your little lucky poker runs. I'm going to roll over and think of my darling Barnette, fully at peace.
Nice job maintaining your poker face despite my little masturbation session. I've always worn my heart on my sleeve, and it's brought so many wonderful women into my life!
Streaks like that might earn you a spot on our crew. You know, if you could pull them off consistently, and knew how to pilot.
Would you like me to loan some layers? It looks like you're going to need them, honey.
Tough luck, ~player~. But any good woman bounces back from a loss or two!
Poor little Earth girl. Don't worry, I won't make fun of your body too much.
Back-to-back shots always sting the most.
I see the old Mejarian charm to starting to get to you.
Can't take your eyes off me, can you, ~player~? Especially with my sword out of the picture.
Rotten old Lady Luck is such a nasty mistress. I, however, can treat you right.
So many losses...want to talk about it? You're such a cutie.
I live in artificial gravity...so I can understand your situation, so to speak.
Put your back into it, ~player~. What self-respecting woman is no good at cards?
Come on, don't they have cards on Earth? It's Gascogne's favorite way to get to know you.
What's wrong? Have you realized how many trinkets I have and are just throwing in the towel?
Come on, ~player~, Mejarians like a challenge. What would the Earthlings back home think?
Don't let your jealousy just make you throw in the towel, ~player~. All women can be beautiful!
Hey, you can still win...against everyone but me.
Don't just drop the ball. A pilot demands excellence of herself at all times!
What kind of self-respecting woman drops the ball with her opponent so close to being shamed? Earth girls...
Trying to beat me to the punch with all the glorious reveals? Or did you just forget how cards work?
What's up, ~player~? Too preoccupied with thoughts of male tubes to focus on the cards?
I know Earth girls are scared of each others' bodies, but come on, don't you want to see me out of this dress?
Come on, ~player~. I expect a man to get all distracted by my breasts, but a woman should have better presence of mind!
You seem a little distracted, ~player~. Has something caught your eye?
Shall I move my hair aside for a better view, ~player~? You know, since you're staring at them instead of your cards anyway.
I hope you're distracted by my breasts out of lust rather than jealousy. Envy makes your body ugly to match your heart.
It's OK to stare, ~player~--I'm very beautiful. Sure you don't want to pay more attention to the cards, though?
I have lots of secret weapons. My Vandread, my breasts...and my fabulous golden hair.
Thought I was all out of tricks? I'm out of interest, but not tricks.
I just knew flipping my hair back would finally draw your eye. Leave these foul Earth men behind and be with women!
Oh, ~player~, you're embarrassing me with your lustful gazes. Earth women don't love each other the way Mejarians do!
What's with this sudden spell of losses, ~player~? Could it be...you're feeling a certain attraction you hadn't before?
Ah, a wandering eye and a miserable poker streak. Classic signs of a woman in love.
I know that lustful, distracted look, ~player~...it's the same one Barnette and I gave each other when we first met.
Ready to join me, ~player~? Women are always better off sticking together in this big universe of ours.
You're stripping so fast, ~player~! I like women's bodies...and I don't think I can keep up with this!
Don't get complacent, now! A Mejarian leaves her mark on a scene long after she leaves.
Tsk, tsk. The Mejarian woman finishes, and the Earth woman thinks it's safe to play it fast and loose.
Was it worth it, ~player~? Wasting all this effort trying to win, when I'm the one who's relaxed and comfortable now?
And it all comes tumbling down. If it's not life-or-death, why worry so much about winning in the first place?
Looks like Earth girls have some fight in them after all. But of course, the Mejarian is still on top.
Pretty good streak, ~player~. Fancy using some of that luck to beat me for a change?
We have ourselves a loser! But you did hold out for a while.
Nice little run, ~player~. Let's see if you've got smarts down the stretch.
Couldn't hold out against Mejarian wits forever, could you?
Just when you needed your streak most.
Hey, don't give up, ~player~. I don't like women who just roll over and take the abuse.
Quite the poker face you were running. You'd make those stonefaces on Anpathos proud.
More runs like that, and you'd have a spot on our pilot team. Meia's always scouting out recruits, you know.
You've got the ferocity of Mejarian soldiers. Too bad I know how to handle them.
Hey, keep it up. And if you see her, Meia loves women that can put up a fight.
Don't give out on us now, dear! I was starting to come around on Earth women.
Can't get complacent, ~player~. I've got quite a few layers left.
Nothing like breaking those streaks. Stun the enemy and go for the kill!
Not feeling so confident anymore? Women have to keep their composure if they want to keep up with those bestial men.
Don't let the loss of your streak rattle you, dear. Got to grab Lady Luck by the arm and twist!
For a second there, I thought I'd actually lose to an Earth woman. But you just couldn't keep it together.
Yeah, yeah. We always outlast your little Harvest-bots, too, so no surprise.
Don't you want to see me show off the good stuff? Well then, I hope you have another streak like that left in you!
Oh, ~player~? That lucky run wasn't lucky enough. Too bad!
Keep it up. I like women with a little fight in them...like Barnette.
Good work, not getting all distracted by my beauty. Bit of a blow to the ego, though.
You had a streak going. You're one step closer to streaking yourself, though.
Nice little lucky run. Luck's a good trait in a pilot...and in a lover.
If Meia were here, she'd be going on and on about your impressive strategical skill. You'd have to get her naked enough to loosen up, though.
Just couldn't keep your streak together when I'm like this? Yeah, I understand. Just take it easy and ogle away!
Finally broke that lucky run with my exquisite figure. Now do you understand the appeal of your own sex?
Knew I'd finally distract you long enough to lose. If you think I'm beautiful, there's a whole pirate crew full of women almost as gorgeous...
Don't fight your lust, ~player~. I know that look in a woman's eye...a burgeoning love of curves and smoothness.
Broke your focus, did I? Maybe a little? Come on, ~player~, stroke my ego here.
I can't fault a lucky run. Every victory over the Harvest we have takes some luck in the end...and a whole lot of love.
You go, girlie. Keep up those winning streaks, since you're so obsessed with winning for some reason.
You've got more fighting spirit down the stretch than I do. Me, a pirate! I can't help but root for you a little.
What incredible poker skills to last so long. Only problem: this is strip poker, and the objective is to masturbate and have fun.
Yeah, yeah, ~player~, enjoy your little lucky poker runs. I'm going to roll over and think of my darling Barnette, fully at peace.
Nice job maintaining your poker face despite my little masturbation session. I've always worn my heart on my sleeve, and it's brought so many wonderful women into my life!
Streaks like that would probably impress Meia. She's utterly convinced you can win this game consistently because Gascogne keeps psyching her out.
Streaks like that might earn you a spot on our crew. You know, if you could pull them off consistently, and knew how to pilot.
I won with that? This is gonna be a breeze.
I know damn well I shouldn't have won with that...you Earth people are never gonna see me naked.
Oh, wow. A high card is enough to beat you people? You'd better enjoy the way I look now.
...Yeah, listen. I've got more layers than it seems, so you'd better hope me winning with a high card was a fluke.
Thanks for getting me out of that jam, sweetheart. Here's a little leg for your trouble.
Close shave for me. Thanks for taking the hit, honey.
Too close for comfort. But now I'm quite comfortable...too bad for you.
Seems you can always count on Earthlings to screw up their cards worse than you did.
That was a high card I had, so you really did me a favor, darling.
Did I ever tell you how sweet I've found Earthlings to be? Going and losing for me when I had such a bad hand...
Hah! And I had a high card. Dealer, you're just messing with me.
Yeah, yeah, I'll get started--wait, I didn't lose? I had a high card!
Damn it, I--wait, how did someone have worse than me? Oh, wow.
...I'm just not sure what to make of you anymore, Dealer. You give me trash, and the rest of them burning trash.
You just pissed away your best chance to get me out of my dress...or did you?
To think that for a second there, I was actually worried...actually, I shouldn't have been regardless.
Damn, do I have any accessories left? ...Wait, I won?
Good thing I still have my ch--wait, what?
Bad news, ~player~...that was the best chance you had for getting me out of this thing! Did you see my hand?
Oh, my! You threw the hand to let me keep my modesty? You are just the sweetest thing, ~player~!
Just when I thought the dress had to go, ~player~ comes to my rescue. You're so sweet!
The moment you've all been waiting f--oh. Well, uh, I won, but I guess I spoiled how I'm down to my dress now.
It's sweet of you to be saving me from my awful high-card hands, ~player~, but it's too little, too late.
Good to know someone on this table is still looking out for me, as I stand here in just my tiny thong.
I'd call you stupid for losing to my high card, but you did get me out of my dress...so it was probably a fluke.
Oh, ~player~...you saved me from removing my thong, but as you can see, my modesty is already in tatters.
Winning with a high card is certainly more reassuring than this tiny bit of fabric I've got around my hips.
Hoo...my life flashed before my eyes for a moment there. My sex life, that is.
I was actually worried for a second there. But then I remembered I could actually stand to relieve some tension...and now I'm all pent-up.
All I had was a high card...but apparently it was high enough.
Come on, all I had was a high card! Aren't you going to finish me off, ~player~?
Come on, ~player~, you can do better than that.
Another layer comes off! How exciting.
Just what could Earth women be hiding? The battle scars of having sex with men?
Now you've got me trying to count how many layers all my crewmates wear.
Don't make me mad, dear. I do have a rapier.
Get to it, girlie. I haven't got all day.
Wasn't even trying...
I mean, I'm a pilot. This is hardly a demanding mental task.
Too easy, ~player~. Take it off.
Expect more losses, ~player~. We Mejarians are clever women.
There's more where that came from. I've handled Mejarian soldiers, you know.
Don't get nervous, ~player~. I know, I'm tall, beautiful, and intelligent.
Oh, good. Fashion tips and more time to think about how many pieces my outfit is.
Something got you down, ~player~? Chin up.
I'm trying to picture what my crewmates' outfits consist of, but they're not always easy to undress by sight.
Just stay cool and collected, ~player~. That's how the Anpathos women were--right up to their spines being harvested.
It's not your fault. Just blame Lady Luck, that miserable old hag.
Look this way while you do it, ~player~. I won't judge...not out loud, anyway.
Hey, ~player~. Might be weird to you, but I grew up learning to love women...
Hey, if you find yourself up against Meia, watch out--that zipper's in front.
Just luck, all luck. No use getting all bent out of shape in this game.
Look this way while you do it, ~player~. I won't judge...not out loud, anyway.
Hey, ~player~. Might be weird to you, but I grew up learning to love women...
Just luck, all luck. No use getting all bent out of shape in this game.
Hey hey, ~player~. Your turn, and make it count while you're at it.
Don't be jealous, ~player~. You're beautiful, too!
Now, now, ~player~. Don't get yourself down by comparing your body to mine. I'm a once-in-a-generation woman.
Meia would be a lot more comfortable in that suit of hers if she ditched the underwear...or at least tried mine instead.
Now, now, don't let your jealousy distract you from the game, ~player~...
Trying to match me, ~player~? It's a little late for you to make a splash.
You really should have stripped naked before me if you wanted to shock people.
Being nude is more fun. Don't tell me Earth girls are big prudes or something.
So common of a sight for me. But I can still masturbate to it just fine.
As mundane as this is to a Mejarian, you're pretty enough for me to work with it.
Keep on losing, ~player~. This is much more fun.
Your turn, ~player~, and my benefit.
I understand, ~player~. You saw what my fingers could do and wanted to skip to the fun.
That's it, honey. Forget this silly card game and get to the real fun.
What a warm feeling...like Christmas with my Barnette.
What's a Mejarian to do, all tapped out like this while Earth women lord over you with their poker skills?
It's a little late for that, Rinkah, darling. I mean, you two look like you walked out of an era before indoor plumbing.
Sorry, dearies. It's just hard to not underestimate a pair of women who look like pages out of history.
It's just second nature, darling. I come from a world of spaceships and energy cores--your little armor-and-bindings schtick doesn't impress me.
Can you blame me, Rinkah? You two look like you can't even spell laser--not very scary to a Dread pilot.
Me-ow. What's this all about, darlings? Are you two ex-girlfriends?
Hey, ladies, there's no need for the hostility! What, are you two former lovers?
I get it, Miss Li. It can be tense running into your old girlfriends again.
Did you two date or something? I can't imagine what else would create such awful hostility.
Trouble with your feisty ex-girlfriend, Chun? If you'd like to upgrade from Juri to Jura, give me a shout.
I may not like exercising, but I can certainly appreciate the end result. Be sure to give us a good view once you two start swinging, darlings.
Now here's a couple of sweaty fitness buffs! And they're already set to start grappling--lucky us.
I think we're on the verge of a fight breaking out already. Try not to hit me, girlies, and make sure to give us some good crotch shots!
Ooh. I really ought to start exercising--just look at those tight butts and solid cores! Be sure to tear each other's clothes once the fight starts.
You two are classmates? Hey, Bright-Eyes, Ponytail here isn't forcing you into this, right? She looks a little smarter.
Blink those wide eyes twice if Monika's forcing you to do this, sweetie. She looks a bit more sinister than you do.
Shame on you, Miss Ponytail, for dragging poor Sayori into this! She looks so terribly naive, and you look so cunning!
Are you two some kind of gruesome twosome in your school? Is Monika forcing you into this just to build up her reputation, dearie?
Run along, girlies--this game is for adults such as myself. Actually, I'm mostly worried Ponytail made Sayori come here, the poor thing.
And what do we have here? Two impressive-looking girls, both as dead-serious as their training schedules! I hope you two don't think you're fooling anyone--there's something going on.
Well, here's a pair of girls we shouldn't piss off. You two look like you can kick through concrete...then blow off some steam together.
So we're all supposed to believe the two sweaty muscle-girls have a purely professional relationship, are we? Maybe that fools Earthlings, but not me.
You two work together? I refuse to believe you haven't...experimented a little, with the way muscles start to glisten after a workout.
Am we really supposed to buy this little cover story about an "investigation"? I think Chun and Cammy here have realized the best exercise machine is each other.
Oh, it's Miss Swimsuit again! But you're in something a little more sensible now. Imagine me stuffed into a one-piece, my hips spilling out the sides.
Aren't you the girl who showed up in a one-piece swimsuit last time? This dress is the one thing my body doesn't stretch to its limit.
Oh, yes, show off your endless wardrobe...this is the only good dress I could steal. I ought to be in photoshoots, not dogfights.
Is this the dramatic poetry of the universe? I, a generational beauty, must live a criminal's life while this flat imp can buy forty dresses?
Oh? This new look is a noble attempt to emulate my beauty, but you can't get my blonde in a bottle--or my breasts.
Oh, it's you, Elesa. Blonde hair is a good start towards capturing my look, but you'll need to fill out a bit for the full effect.
Oh, it's the bikini beach pirate girl again. Why'd you cut your hair? I was looking forward to giving you some styling tips!
...Honestly, you're making my job far too easy. I stand out as gorgeous even when other girls aren't hasty scribbles.
...Is this what being around me does to your self-image, Megumin?
Oh, it's you--that tall girl with the oversized axe. I see you've moved on to an oversized rifle!
It's no laser ring, but those mechanical guns still have their fans. My girlfriend collects antiques--I wonder what she'd think of that enormous thing.
Oh, dear. You were already showing off plenty of skin before, honey. This sort of thing starts to give diminishing returns.
My, my, you're hardly wearing anything but the coat. If you're vying for ~player~'s attention, a revealing outfit only goes so far.

state.text: D-did you say you're a Harvest Princess? Hey, what's the big idea? Was this whole game a setup?

case.state: Well, hello there, Miss--H-Harvest Princess? Excuse me? Did I walk into some kind of Earth blood ritual? Hey!

state.text: W-what do you mean, you're dressed as a "Harvest Princess"? W-was this a trap? Stay away from me!

case.state: My, what happened to that peppy little girl from last time? I suppose we all go through a moody phase...I know I did.
Awww, you're so adorable, Miss Princess! You could never scare anyone just by dressing up like a witch--your eyes are too sweet.
O-oh, is that you, Misato? ...Eugh. Is that traditional Earth makeup? Now I know why men think we're hideous monsters.
Ugh, Misato, is that really you under there? I thought you'd be old enough to not overdo it on makeup. Now I know why men fear us.
Oh, look, it's the old lady again. Do you always dress so lavishly for Christmas, or has your butt sagged some more since we met?
Hmph. Back again for Christmas, are we, Granny? Clothes don't make the woman, you know--unless you're sagging some more.
Nagisa? It is you, that sugary-sweet little girl! Why are you all dressed up like a maid now, hm? You ought to be a fairy or an elf.
U-uh--! A-are you a--g-ghost? I-I didn't mean any of the nasty things I said about you being flat!

state.text: W-W-Weiss? W-when did you die? Are you haunting me because I made fun of your breasts? Eek!

case.state: Oh, dear. Well, I know models come and go, but honestly, there's no reason to take your "death" so literally, honey. What a drama queen.
Oh, it's you, the girl who makes me feel short. I like how you've dolled yourself up a bit--what's the occasion?
Oh, what a lovely wedding dress! I always picture what I'll be wearing when I embrace Barnette at the altar...it'll be wonderful!
Well, it's Miss Haru again! And you're quite a bit more spruced-up than your old sweater look. Who are you dressing up for, hm?
Oh, no, it's you again. The girl who kept playing tricks on my eyes...well, how cute, you've done something with your hair. Creeper...
H-hey, since when is your name "Dahlia"? You're that Ini girl who played dumb and then got all creepy on me!
Hey, do you think I'm some brainless blonde who can't remember your name? You're that creepy Ini girl, "Dahlia"!
You look so cute in that costume. Hanging around me must've brightened your spirit over all this time.
Honestly, I could hardly get you to wear a Christmas hat back in the day! It's my influence that's softened you up, you know!
Oh, it's you, the cute little horseback rider whose skirt was too short for her backside. I see you've dropped all pretense of modesty.
Oh, how cute, you've brought a stuffed animal. A bit childish for someone stripping--I have another person to cuddle in bed.
Aren't you a little old to be clinging to plush toys, honey? Adults cuddle each other in bed.
Aren't you that timid Florina girl who had several layers of armor? Who forced you into such a risqu bunny suit?
Well, now! Haven't you matured, Miss Pegasus? You're dressed more provocatively than I am, after all your crying last time!

state.text: U-uh--! A-aren't you--that fiery muscle girl with the tattoos? I didn't mean fiery so literally! S-stay back!
Agh! R-Rinkah? W-what demon crawled inside your head since last time and set it on fire? Don't touch me!

case.state: Well, you were already showing more skin than me the last time we met. What do you wear on Christmas, three pieces of tape?
I admit, I've never dressed as any "sexy animal" for Halloween...it just seems so clich. I'll have to give it more thought this year...
Oh, are you a little less glum around Halloween, Raven? I see you're learning to embrace the beauty of long, flowing, shimmering hair.
...Wait a minute. Aren't you that creepy island girl who was always going on about having sex with animals? God, what've you done to your skin?
...You're that oversexed island girl, aren't you? I heard men's seed is a pearly white...I guess you've had a bit too much of it.
Oh, it's Miss Assassin, looking for a day of fun in the sun. Water and sand just ruin my hair...I prefer an umbrella's shade.
And who have we here? It's...eugh. The girl who threatens bodily harm because our names sound alike. Are you enjoying your summer?
Oh, not you again. We're only a vowel apart, and you wanted to tear me apart for that. Just go for a swim and leave me alone!
You're a stirring mermaid, are you? Something about being around you certainly stirs up headaches...
Aren't you that self-proclaimed goddess from last time? You haven't filled out much, but you could certainly use some sun.
Oh, honey, that's so much better. I'm glad you've freed yourself from all that heavy armor--now let your beauty breathe.
You're that haughty girl with the magical staff and way too much armor. I'm sure this is only for summer, but you ought to just wear it year-round.
Waitress, be a dear and bring me some fruity drink--mostly fruit, and a little bit drink. Thank you!
Hello there, Miss Pinkie. How can you stomach being dressed so scandalously--is that all Earth's Easter is?
Oh, if it isn't the pink-haired, pink-skinned girl from before. What caused you to dress so Mejarian-esque? Earth's Easter?
Oh, don't remind me of my Barnette's cooking with that burger-tube. I'm afraid I'll get fat, the way she feeds me...
Oh, it's Miss Moneybags again, back for the summer season. Shouldn't you be seeking some shade? Your fair complexion is the best thing you have going for you.
Oh, it's you, Estelle! Were you let out of the castle again to see the sun? I know I have a swimsuit lying around in my quarters somewhere.
Who's this? Why, it's Miss Princess again, ready to read some books in the summer sun. I should've brought my swimsuit!
Oh, it's you again--Little Miss Weiss Schnee. I see you're going for the bold look with those color contrasts--a lesson learned from me, perhaps?
Ooh, you're classmates? Is this an after-school date? I've never seen a man-woman couple!
Ooh, you two go to school together? Are you on a date? Romance between a boy and a girl--in the flesh!
Classmates? Seems we might be intruding on a little man-woman action--but I guess that's common on Earth, right?
A beautiful blond boy and girl, going to the same school? Strange venue for a date, but I'm too excited to see a male-female romance in person to care!
My, what kind of perverted students is your school generating, going to strip poker together? Well, since you're here...show me how men and women love each other.
Jeez, what a head case. Good thing she's got her girlfriend here to keep her in check.
Running, running, running. We're not trying to kill you here, you know.
Time for take two, everyone. Better than the first, perhaps?
And there she goes. Poor little thing, beaten down by the world.
Ooh, a schooldate? Far be it from me to understand men's tastes, dear, but I'm not sure you've got the height to woo your handsome blonde classmate here.
I think I can see what's going on here, Shorty. You're in love with your blonde hunk-o-man here, and you're playing strip poker with him so he ignores your more beautiful classmates.
Classmates? Is this the last desperate move from the short, bespectacled girl's playbook? Land a man by dropping the pretenses and playing strip poker with him?
Oh, dear, Little Miss Four-eyes, I'm sorry for interrupting your plan to strip for your blonde classmate. He'll just be staring at me the whole time.
It doesn't take enormous lenses to see through your plan, Futaba--you want to strip for your classmate here. Men are dumb, it could work.
Oh my God, Meia! This Sei girl looks just like you! Ask her out, would you?
Deep, gorgeous eyes, short blue hair, even armor! Meia, you and Sei were made for each other!
Oh my God, Meia, look how adorable Sei is! She's like you if you were a few inches shorter and knew how to smile.
Meia, if you don't ask Sei out, I will personally do it for you. She looks just like you--imagine the cute blue-haired babies!
S-so, uh, Meia! I know you and Sei got off on the wrong foot, but look what a cute couple you'd make! Blue hair, gorgeous eyes!
...Better defuse things. Hey, Sei, maybe you want to give my boss another chance? She's crabby, but you two would be so cute together!
I'm sorry Meia was so rude before, Sei. You're as cute as a button--and a cheery girlfriend would really lighten her up!
Please don't judge my boss too harshly, Sei, darling. If you'd like to brighten her mood, she's single!
Oh, Sei, you're such a cutie, and opposites attract! Please understand Meia's unease with soldiers--and think of your cute blue-haired babies together.
Is she ever. All Meia needs is a woman's touch to melt away all her tension...
More than single, Sei--desperately single. She's so overworked and stressed...if only a girl were there in her bed each night.
Ohoho. There's single, and then there's my boss here. She's married to the job.
Is that an invitation, Sei, darling? My leader acts all-business, but she's a sweet little thing beneath the ice...
Well, you're certainly swamped with work, yes. But that just means you need to find a girl who'll relieve all that stress.
Of course, honey, but you'd handle your work a lot better if a woman were there for you. You know, to massage the tension out.
Oh, just stop it. Having a ton of work is no excuse--I'm second-ranked, and I need Barnette around to handle all that stress!
So go and find a girl who's just as work-obsessed, Leader. She'll leave you alone...and then the two of you can snuggle your stress away.
M-Meia? What are you egging her on for? You--always defuse things!
H-hey, Meia, this woman's nuts! Guns or no guns, she's going to try to kill you!
...Meia? What's gotten into you, taunting her like that? What if she does it?
Uh, Leader? What happened to cool, collected Meia Gisborn? The girl who defuses arguments?
What's the deal with this woman, Rinkah? You know each other? You take orders from her?
So is this girl your commanding officer, Rinkah? You certainly treat her that way.
My, Rinkah, your commanding officer is such a young, fresh-faced woman! Ours is a wizened old crone.
You can cut your hair short, Corrin, but you're still such a cute young girl! I can't believe you order Rinkah around.
Hey, what did I just walk in on? Are you two soldiers trying to get to know each other a little better?
My, what a fierce-looking pair of women the two of you are! Have the flames of war lit a fire in your hearts?
The two of you are soldiers? Well, if you're playing this together, you're probably more lovers than fighters at this point.
Interesting choice of a first date, you little fighting lovebirds! But I understand--my girlfriend is a pilot just like me.
And what do we have here? Two little soldiers interested on the bodies beneath the armor? Hey, plenty of womanly love blooms on the battlefield.
Heeheehee! This embarrassed act isn't fooling me, darling--you're just trying to get closer to your ladyfriend here!
Figures such an embarrassed girl would use this as a roundabout way to strip in front of her crush. Just ask her out, Florina!
Friends? I don't buy it--you want Lyn so badly, don't you? You don't need to play a stripping game to ask her out!
As a Mejarian, Florina, I can see two women in love a mile away. I know you're embarrassed, but there's better ways to get close than strip poker.
Oh my God, you're sisters? Don't tell me this sort of thing is a family-friendly Earth pastime!
Oh, wow, I'm playing at the incest table. Is this a thing on Earth? Is your mother stripping elsewhere in the establishment?
Why would you ever invite your sister to strip poker? Unless incest is culturally accepted on this fine blue planet.
Sisters? Well, you're both cuties, but I can't help but imagine this is awkward for you. Or do Earthlings do this all the time?
Wait, wait, wait! Are you two a couple? Ohhhh, that's so cute! Show me some magic!
Oh, do we have two magical lovebirds at the table? The feisty one and the shy one?
I didn't know Earth women could fall in love, too! I bet having all that magic creates some explosive nights together!
You two make such a cute couple! Sola, how'd a shy thing like you land such a fiery girl like this? Did you use your magic?
Pfft! Well, now we know how Earth soldiers act on downtime--taking their little sisters to strip poker games!
Is this the kind of values they teach you in the military, dear? "Strip in front of your little sister"?
Premature white hair, weapons, grim expressions? You don't need to tell me you're sisters--though I do question a soldier's ethics to bring her little sister here.
Well, looks like we're stuck with a pair of literal ice queens! And they're related--I guess they don't teach you that's weird in Earth's military.
~player~ this, ~player~ that. Are you always this desperate, honey, or is it because of my beautiful Mejarian body?
You're such an obsessive little witch of a girl. I bet she's feeling a bit inadequate at the moment, isn't she, ~player~?
You know, Tharja, you really shouldn't obsess over one girl so much. A more well-endowed woman might swipe her away.
