Who'd you leave holding down the fort, anyway? I don't see Barnette wrangling all our pilots without her guns...oh, what's the flight schedule look like tomorrow?
So, uh...how's our flight practice shaping up tomorrow? Any fancy formations you've dreamed up?
I bet it's dependable, though. My dress sure wouldn't deflect any laser shots!
Remember the last raid we staged? That soldier probably would have tagged you if not for that armor.
Dear, dear. Me naked, you unarmored. We're not the fierce Mejarian pirates we entered as!
As bulky as your armor looks, Meia, it seems pretty snug at the moment. Some pirate I am.
Please, Meia. You're cute, but I just don't see you that way.
I just want these poor Earth people to see how cute Mejarians can be. Is that so wrong?
Why, I never! My heart belongs to Barnette and Barnette alone, Leader.
Don't get too full of yourself, now. Lots of Mejarians have a great figure...you're just one of them.
Oh, don't get all full of yourself. You'll make a mistake next mission and careen into a Harvest cube.
Oh, don't get full of yourself. They'll think every Mejarian is as vain as I am.
She won't admit it, but my Leader here's curvy, isn't she? Her vanity is buried pretty deep.
Behold, the only Mejarian without an ounce of vanity. Well, not about her body, anyway.
Think Meia's not as vain as I am? Ask her about her piloting skills.
Isn't she so much cuter with feminine shoulders? Meia's always shooting her looks in the foot...but she's just as proud, if you listen close.
So, ~name~, been on a date with a man? Had sex with one? I'm curious what Earth girls do with their time.
Since your wardrobe is uninteresting, how's your sex life? Do Earth women sleep with each other?
You know what clothes of mine I'd consider "minor"? None of them. Go for extremes.
Good thing you're here, Meia. I wasn't sure how many pieces your outfit was.
Oh, I can't wait to come home and see what Barnette's made for dinner! ...I hope I'm not getting fat.
You know, ~name~, if you have any relationship experience, I have a certain stoic crewmate who could use it...
Sigh...you're all so boring.
Valore's got that same skimpy bodysuit you do, Meia. But with that exotic dark skin of hers underneath...you should ask her out.
What did I do to deserve this? Besides tease you all mercilessly.
Misty's outfit is a little hard to decipher. But she's from Pluto, so I guess that makes sense.
Boring, boring, bo-ring. Honestly, ~name~, are you always this much of a killjoy?
Help a fellow woman out and take off something good, would you? For God's sake...
Hey, Mejarians know how to have fun. Well, maybe not my boss over there, but still.
Dita's got a nice figure...eh, I can't masturbate to her. She's too sweet.
I can already tell you wear more than my darling Barnette.
Hey, I started this game more exposed than you. Live a little.
Jeez, you Earth girls act like there's a reward for winning.
We didn't put in any money, you know. The only reward for winning is a whole lot of sexual frustration.
I just want to squeeze you. Squeeze the life out of you, that is. For being boring.
Have you been with a man? They're so hard to figure out!
I would've invited Dita here, but she's way too pure. She'd be crying by now.
Such cute little Earth items! Where'd you get them?
Earth fashion is really all over the place. But then, the state usually decides it on Mejare.
Haaah...I really ought to inspect my Dread this week. I'll get yelled at...
My Barnette would be nearly out by now. She only wears, like, three things.
I should show you the pictures I took with Ezra's baby. She's the most adorable thing!
Does Parfet wear anything besides that jumpsuit of hers? Though it is kind of cute.
So, you represent the pinnacle of Earth fashion, right?
Your outfit is all over the place. Come aboard the Nirvana and I'll give you a full Mejarian makeover!
Earth women's wardrobes are such a mishmash. How many competing groups of people live over there, anyway?
I guess when you're forced to live inside giant gears, your wardrobe suffers. Poor Earthlings.
Have you been with a man, ~name~? I was told they really don't care about fashion...
So, ~name~, been on a date with a man? Had sex with one? I'm curious what Earth girls do with their time.
Since your wardrobe is uninteresting, how's your sex life? Do Earth women sleep with each other?
You know what clothes of mine I'd consider "minor"? None of them. Go for extremes.
Meia has that bodysuit she loves so much...but that's really it. And I doubt there's anything else besides that smock she thinks passes for pajamas.
Oh, I can't wait to come home and see what Barnette's made for dinner! ...I hope I'm not getting fat.
I'd have more fun watching myself strip in front of a mirror. Better visual reward, too.
Hey, Barnette would strip if I asked her. I don't need this.
My Barnette's more than a pilot...she runs the storage with Gascogne, too. She's so smart!
Honestly, I wear a lot compared to my crewmates. What's Dita got besides her jacket and skirt? And her insatiable curiosity about men?
Sigh...you're all so boring.
Valore's got that same skimpy bodysuit Meia does. But with that exotic dark skin of hers underneath...
What did I do to deserve this? Besides tease you all mercilessly.
Misty's outfit is a little hard to decipher. But she's from Pluto, so I guess that makes sense.
Boring, boring, bo-ring. Honestly, ~name~, are you always this much of a killjoy?
Help a fellow woman out and take off something good, would you? For God's sake...
Hey, Mejarians know how to have fun. Well, maybe not Meia, but still.
Dita's got a nice figure...eh, I can't masturbate to her. She's too sweet.
I really should've been more cunning...and not gotten bored towards the end.
Guess it's my own fault for just sort of throwing in the towel.
I masturbated to completion and everything, and somehow I'm still feeling unsatisfied.
You're taking this so seriously. You must really want that non-existent reward for winning.
You really think so? But women always like it when I flirt with them!
Seriously? Men are a strange species. Girls love it when I come over and play around!
Men don't like being teased so much? But I always tease girls! What am I supposed to do, just wait around for them?
What, so I just have to wait for a man to tease me? That's boring! Women always like it when I approach them!
Oh? Does Mr. ~name~ actually plan on removing something substantial?
Oh? Is ~name~ about to prove that Earth men are capable of having fun?
Tarakkians are no fun at all, but I guess we Mejarians made them that way. Always eating their livers and such.
I know you're getting antsy, ~name~, but don't forget I'm armed.
You don't have to go that far for my sake, Mr. Alien.
You're such a gentleman, ~name~! I'm still so clothed.
I want to see if male skin is as dangerous to the touch as I've been taught.
Come on, ~name~, time to prove all my girlhood teachers wrong about men's evils.
Well, now! Finally, a real development.
Finally, a hint of fun from a man. You do have a heart!
Ooh, I can't wait, ~name~.
Looks like all my teasing finally got to you.
Oh, I just can't take this! So much male skin!
Bring it on, ~name~. My hear can take it.
That's a whole lot better. Take off some more.
Hey, ~name~...finish the job, and maybe I will.
Hey, now we're getting somewhere. And I'd like to get there with you, ~name~.
That's more like it. Show me every inch of a man's body.
Men are so gross. But I better see more to be sure.
Oh, my. I think the Harvest is coming for me, the way my heart is beating.
What's that? Is the man not so sure about his lead anymore?
Oho. Is the man starting to sweat a little?
Thought I'd just roll over and die? Well, I might roll over and masturbate.
Oh, dear. I'm so embarrassed already, and now a man is taking off the good stuff.
That's more like it, ~name~. Show me what a man likes to hide.
Hey, ~name~, you don't strike as tougher to handle than Tarakkian soldiers. Though I'm usually clothed when I deal with them.
That's the spirit, ~name~. I'm glad you're starting to work with me here.
Trust me, ~name~. You're gonna want to be naked when I start going at it...and I want to see how you react.
Now you're on a roll, ~name~! Keep it up!
This has been good for me, ~name~. Now make it great.
About time! Let's see if your body is as bristly as they say.
Just what I've been looking for. Well, I guess your tube would be a liiiiiittle better...
What's this? A man showing skin? Hide your Mejarians!
That's quite the choice. I hope you don't regret it later.
I've already gone over the edge...but who knows? Maybe there's another one you can push me past.
Oh, I just can't take this! A man leering at my defeated nude body, stripping himself down...it's enough to make the hardiest Mejarians swoon.
Hah! What'd I tell you, Nayru? Even men can offer no resistance to my womanly charms.
Heeheehee. I can't say I'm surprised, Nayru--there's never been a woman I couldn't seduce, so the same should hold for a man.
What did you expect, Nayru? I'm the most beautiful woman on a planet full of them--it only makes sense a man would throw off his clothes for me.
Oh, my, ~player~. I know Nayru questioned your love for me, but this is too much! My beauty knows no bounds, it seems.
Oh, my! And I thought men were courageous! But this mountain of muscles hides his thing from my teeth.
What's the matter, Cap? Afraid this Mejarian will just bite it right off?
Come now, honey--there's no reason to hide bheind your shield. I don't eat every man's organs.
Don't be that way, dear. If I wanted to eat you, I'd go for those delicious shoulder muscles. So put the shield down.
Oh, Dita would be going crazy right now. That girl is so adorable with her men-obsession!
Game moving too fast for you, ~name~? I haven't even lost any clothes yet!
Don't mind Meia's nasty looks. She acts all cool, but don't be fooled--you're driving her crazy.
If you think you're close to getting me out of my dress to match you...maybe you are.
Such a poor show from our male friend here. Can't you make me work for it?
Earth men are popular with the girls, right? They just flock right to you?
I read something about how men think about sex nonstop. Is that true? I mean, Tarakkians have no outlet for that.
If Tarakkians weren't brainwashed to fear women, I bet they'd be awful jealous of you Earth guys. Surrounded by beauties.
Oh, Dita would be going crazy right now. That girl is so adorable with her men-obsession!
Game moving too fast for you, ~name~? I haven't even lost any clothes yet!
Ever play against Meia? She acts all cool, but don't be fooled--you'd drive her crazy.
If you think you're close to getting me out of my dress to match you...maybe you are.
You've been around the bend with Earth girls, right? Well...Mejarians are goddesses by comparison.
What's the Earth dating scene like? Any girls like me?
I hope Barnette won't mind if I'm spellbound by your manly charms.
And I stripped you all by myself. Pilots tend to need teamwork.
Forgive me if I get a little too excited. I've never seen a man quite like this!
I was taught as a little girl that men's hides were all rough and scaly, you know. Doesn't look that way.
If you think your manly appeal will so easily sway me from Barnette, you should know she's a pilot and a great cook.
Duero's a smart cookie, but I guess he's the exception among men.
I wonder if Paiway's hitting puberty. Better keep her away from men's degenerate influences.
I thought men were brave. Just going to stop there?
I should've brought Duero. He's handsome and he'd be naked by now.
You're leaving me hanging, ~name~. Think my breasts'll hang next?
Shame, but it looks like Hibiki and Bart's intelligence is about the benchmark for men. You know, lovable idiots.
Not too far behind me after all, huh?
Jura Basil Elden doesn't go down that easy.
Getting worried, ~name~? Men should always worry around Mejarians.
I like what I see, ~name~. But I could always see more, if you'd be so kind.
Jura Basil Elden doesn't go down that easy...unless your name is Barnette Orangello.
Beautiful as I am, sir, don't forget I'm also a cunning pilot.
Catching up to me? I'm so flattered, sir.
I just don't know how to react. Men are so frightening!
What else is a man hiding away? Got to be something worth seeing for this Mejarian, right?
Finally, something good from you. Took you long enough, handsome.
I don't mind men watching me do this...except for Rabat, that jerk. He's so gross!
I'm on the edge of my seat, ~name~. And at another edge, too.
Don't stop there, ~name~. I'm sure a man exposing himself would be enough to make me go another round.
Men's bodies are so fascinating. How do they balance themselves out without the extra...assets?
Little Hibiki's got the moxie to make up for his size. How do you compensate...and for what?
The men in my life are a fascinating bunch. But now you're starting to catch up to them in that regard.
Maybe it's just the antigravity, but this girl's lit a fire in my heart, Leader! Do you think I should wear a suit like yours?
Hey, Leader, this girl's making bodysuits look good even for a woman with some meat on her. Should I wear one?
I think you've managed to make bodysuits boring for me, Meia. This girl is making me want to get one now!
Maybe I should abandon this silly dress and opt for a bodysuit like yours and Ochako's, Meia--just bare it all! What do you say?
I know I'm not as slender and lithe as you, Leader, but neither is Ochako. Should I get myself a bodysuit?
Nooo! Nayru was so cute! How many girls do they have to take from me?
Nayru! Noooo! This isn't fair--she was the cutest one! They wanted her lovely blue hair!
Nayruuuu! The absolute worst girl they could've killed! Her hair was so gorgeous!

state.text: Eeek! No! Nayruuu! Damn it, how'd the Harvest follow me here and steal the cutest girl?

case.state: ...Is "China" some other country? I'm wandering out of my depth here. What's the difference between all these Earth factions, anyway?
..."China"? I'm still wrapping my head around Japan. Is this planet really split into so many different pieces? Mejare has enough trouble functioning as one.
Wait, are you saying all these Earth countries had different writing systems, too? It sounds like such a mess. Why can't you all just unite as one planet?
Ah, I see. Two girls competing for one man's affections--I've seen that play out on just our little ship. You should really just come out and--well, write it.
Well, now. I may not have much experience with men, but I know that the best way to treat the wounds of love is to rip the bandage off. Just tell him how you feel!
Two girls chasing after one man? I consider myself something of an expert on these matters. You're wasting your time--the sooner you confess, the better.
Oh, this is just the way schoolgirls are, I suppose. Always tiptoeing around the issue--stop wringing your hands and just admit it to him already!
...Oh. Well, that puts a damper on things. It's one thing for men to not be marriage material, but why doesn't your daughter like you?
...A daughter, but you're not married? That's terrible--I won't get too attached to the man I take seed from if they can't commit. And what's up with her, ignoring her mother?
...Oh. I suppose men don't value marriage and romance the way we do. Is your daughter just going through a rebellious phase...?
Oh, a school for goddesses, I should've known. Is this part of your graduation research, observing human anatomy?
Oh, right, you're a goddess who goes to goddess school. Are you doing work for the film club now, recording humans in their bare skin?
Well, it certainly got the attention of our weapons trainers when I joined the crew. No one expected the haughty buxom girl to have such a unique skillset.
Little did I know I'd be applying those skills with a real sword in just a few years. I filled quite the niche on our armed squads, delicate as I appeared.

state.text: No! Please! I'm too beautiful to die!
Ack! Don't shoot! I didn't steal anything! Honest!
Not in the face! Or the breasts! Don't ruin my corpse!
I-I can't die here! I have a girlfriend! And hundreds of admirers!
Nooo! Oh, I only brought my sword! I should've known Earth girls were all crazed gunwomen!

case.state: You have a secret? Well, here's your chance to keep me interested, Plain-Jane.
You haven't impressed so far, Plain-as-Day. So color me interested with this "secret" of yours.
I'm listening, dearie. You're so average that I'm honestly willing to buy that you have a "secret."
Unless your secret is a third breast, I just can't see you wowing me, dear.
Uh, well, moving on from the skin business--I'm actually more concerned about that giant syringe you have for an arm.
...So anyway, what the hell is wrong with your arm...syringe...thing?
Why do I care? You have pink skin, you're taking your dress off already, and, uh, you have a giant syringe for an arm.
...Are you really not aware of how strange you look? Like, I was nice and didn't immediately comment on your, uh, syringe.
Well, I care about other things, too, like Oh My God you have a giant gross needle for an arm I hate needles what's going on.
And what have we here? Ooh, you're more depraved than I thought, Miss Vampire Hunter.
Heeheehee! Undoing your bra beneath your shirt, you little tease? A woman after my own heart...if I wore bras.
That's a sexy little move there, honey. I'd try it, too, but bras have never been to my tastes in the first place.
So are you trying to be fun and sexy, or just throwing us all off? I'd certainly prefer the former.
Pfft! So much for the cool-and-calculated act! Even I wouldn't stoop that low...maybe.
There's no need, dear. You're showing your true colors already.
OK, even I wouldn't count my makeup. It's just luck, honey, don't be so sore about it.
Look, honey, if you have to wear enough makeup that it counts as clothing, it wouldn't save your looks in the first place.
Oho--and the Masked Woman is revealing herself! I'm sure she has a good explanation for hiding.
What's this, now? The Masked Woman feels like looking us all in the eye? I'd love to know why you waited so long.
This had better be interesting, dear. I want a face worth waiting for, because the rest of us are revealing more sensitive areas.
Afraid of my evil alien gaze, honey? How xenophobic--now take off that mask so I can see why you wore it.
So soon, dearie? I guess that "Secret Identity" of yours isn't worth hiding your pleasure from us.
I guess you'd rather look your admirers in the eyes than conceal you identity any longer than a few rounds.
So much for your "Secret Identity," honey. That's the second thing you're taking off!
Oho! And the mask comes off. Why you bothered with it at all if it's going this quickly, I'll never understand.
Well, look who's overcoming her shyness! Guess that "Secret Identity" didn't last too long when you could've been nude instead.
Wait, what? I thought you were just dressed in typical overly-conservative Earth wear, but instead you're royalty?
That was a disguise? Hey, dearie, next time try hiding your face. That might throw people off the princess's trail.
You were disguised? You're royalty? If the commoners can't recognize their princess's face, I can see why you're still in power.
Oh, what's this? You're nobility? Well, well, well, honey...you'll make an excellent ransom.
My, my, another magic trick? Can't you dazzle us with your own naked body, dear?
This is getting old already, honey. By all means, show your body instead--that's far more interesting.
You Earth girls and your parlor tricks. Is this the sort of thing that amuses men and their tiny primate brains? I'd rather see you naked.
Can't you just magic-off your whole outfit, dearie? I'd rather see how far down your makeup goes.
Well, aren't you feisty? I make one little joke and you get all menacing!
Are you some kind of dominatrix the bar hired? So intimidating after an innocuous comment.
I don't like your tone, Missy. You think you're oh-so scary by taking offense to a little joke!
You like making threats, don't you, dear? All I did was say we have cute names and you start plotting my demise.
..."Sensitive to clothing"? I just like talking about fashion--er, well, there you go throwing your shirt off. Can you hear me?
...Apparently you're not sensitive to clothing--not if you're starting that big. Is this girl deaf?
Now that I look at it, you're kind of glowing. And way to skip the striptease! What's up with you?
..."Sensitive to clothing"? What am I, a robot? Jeez, I get an absolutely adorable girl, and she's a nutcase.
...Well, at least you're blonde again. Blonde's a good color...I can stare at that and tune you out.
At least there's no gun this time. Now you'll have to make a racket by shouting.
Yeah, yeah, keep on screaming. I'll just stare at that lovely blonde hair and try to forget what's under it...
Your blue version really taught me the value of peace and quiet.

state.text: Ack! No! The Paksis! I should've known this was a dream!
Eeek! Ladybug! The Harvest has got you! Nooo!
Aaack! Don't touch me! W-what's happening? Help!
Aaack! T-the Harvest! They're here! Run! I'm sorry, Ladybug!
Eeek! No! Please! I have a girlfriend! I can't die here!

case.state: ...Ladybug?
Heeheehee! What was that again? Too-ayy-jolee?
Too--too-ay-julee? Did I get it right? Help me out here, cutie.
Tooayyjolie? Was that it? Oh, all your words just melt together into a chocolate fondue of language!
Too--tooayy, uh, what was that? I mean, it was adorable, but I didn't really catch it.
Haha! I have no clue what you just said, but you've got to teach me, Marinette! This'll drive my girlfriend wild.
I can just picture the look on Barnette's face when I start whispering these sweet nothings. Could you teach me?
What was that? Anyway, omigosh, Marinette, you have to give me some French lessons! Barnette will melt in my arms!
Whatever you just said, my girlfriend Barnette would absolutely melt, it's so romantic! Won't you please teach me?
I can't believe you're down to your underwear already. Make me lose something, Meia.
Feel free to, you know, involve me in this game. Don't leave your crewmate behind like this.
I can't believe sourpuss Meia is stealing all the stripping fun for herself.
Come on. I came here to strip, and somehow Miss Pokerface can't make it happen.
Oooh, the dress! Now we're talking! ...What's the matter, Misato?
Aww, someone's embarrassed even through the booze! What's got you all shy suddenly, huh?
Even half in the bag like this, you're all nervous. Hiding something under that dress?
Hey, Misato, what's wrong? You look a little on edge suddenly, even between burps.
Whoa. OK, you meant it. Can't say I understand the rush, but more power to you.
You're not kidding around, are you, darling? This your first time stripping for an audience? Don't overdo things.
Try to keep the audience interested, honey. Strippers don't walk out onstage naked for a reason.
Straight for the bra? What an amateur...it's shock value. The tease is half the fun, silly!
Oh, dropping the little light show already? You kind of looked like our Paksis energy core--it was nostalgic!
Oh, Navi, dear, I wasn't complaining about the light that much. You look just like our energy core, the Paksis!
Oh, you have a body underneath the sparkles, do you? And here I thought you were a little mini-Paksis.
Sorry to dim your light, Miss Fairy--I know I can shine with beauty myself. You remind me of the Paksis, which powers our ship!
Aw, dropping the light right away? You gave me the same warm feeling as the Paksis, glowing like that...I wonder how the ship's doing.
Ooh, that's a nifty trick, dear! You can bet I'd give it a shot if I could...do you think I should wear a bodysuit?
I've always felt I'm too pillowy and soft for a bodysuit, but you really make it your own! Could I pull it off, too, sweetie?
Hey, Miss Gravity, I was really liking the look of your figure all stuffed into that suit. Do you think I'd look good in the same thing?
Mejare has a thing for bodysuits, you know...I wonder if I should get myself one. There's just no tease to it, you know?
Seriously, honey, slow down. Feeling self-conscious next to me?
Listen, dear--I know I have this effect on women, but there's no reason to be this jealous.
Just rushing to outdo me, huh? Sorry, but you're still a little frumpy by comparison.
Feeling inadequate, sweetie? You should be proud of your body--don't fret about how I'm much more beautiful.
Come on, honey. Throwing off all your clothes like this reeks of desperation next to a goddess such as myself.
Is that your own special die, or does it just work for anyone? ...Can I try?
So if I rolled that thing, could it give me a whole new outfit? I mean, I do love my dress, but hey.
Now I'm starting to get curious about that die of yours. Would it work if I rolled it?
Does that die work solely for you? What if I just snatched it like the pirate I am?
But don't worry about all that! Let's see what outfit's next, cutie!
Another vortex, another wonderful piece of fashion to ogle. I'm so lucky!
You call yourself the lucky one, but I came here hoping to see some cool fashion choices.
Simply magical. My luck that I'd meet you, not these vortices. Things just work out for me!
You always have such a hard time admitting that things just went sour for you. It's always your fault, isn't it?
You're not going to insist there's some kind of strategy to this "throw away four cards" business, are you?
I guess fortune just smiles on the beautiful.
Yeah, folks, it's all one piece. I said she didn't wear much...but isn't it sexier that way?
And there it goes. But what a dazzling move, zipping it all down in one stroke!
Like a beautiful butterfly emerging from her cocoon. And all at once, too!
I wonder if I can make my dress come off all at once like that...it's bold and sexy.
Avert your eyes, ladies--a whole lot of lovely Mejarian skin is about to hit them all at once.
Prepare yourselves, mortals--that bodysuit's all one piece. She's down to underwear already!
Try not to lose control of yourselves. Meia's about to drop that whole suit in one sexy little move!
Everyone got their pacemakers primed? That suit's one piece, so you're about to get an eyeful of Meia's figure.
Ever seen a woman with abs? Ever seen a Mejarian with abs? You're about to.
As you can see, folks, I was a real sweetheart bringing Meia here. That suit's all one piece!
Meia here is good at cards, but she doesn't have the wardrobe to last around here. Down to underwear already!
Aren't I great bringing Meia here? Look how little she wears. Not that that bodysuit left anything to the imagination.
Meia barely wears anything, as you can see. I think she secretly likes the hungry looks the other pilots give her.
No one get excited. Meia wears underwear beneath that sexy little suit of hers.
This is just a tease. Big zipdown, sure, but she's got underwear. It's the most Meia will jerk you around, though.
Keep your heart rates in check, ladies. Meia's too prudish to not have underwear beneath that suit, sexier as that might make her.
Don't let yourselves get all aflutter. She wears underwear, and it's probably boring.
As you can see, my boss isn't the type to pull her punches. All in one go, just like I did!
Meia Gisborn isn't the type to tease you, as you can see. Quick and to the point!
Meia's so sweet compared to me and my teasing ways. Barely lost at all, and she's showing off her cute underwear!
The whole suit in one go? You're awfully nice to these Earth people even though they've tried kill us.
The whole suit? That makes me feel a bit better about being naked. This is very embarrassing, you know.
Nothing I don't see when you hit the showers, right? If anything, now I'm out of your way.
Don't mind me. I'll just ogle my boss from afar, in my defeated little huddle.
Zip it off in one go...for the others, of course. I'm not interested.
You'll have to excuse my interest. Who knew my cold little squadron leader was so cute?
Where would you say you rank on our crew, Meia? I hear some of the low-rankers whisper about how they have a crush on you.
You try to act all modest, but you are our leader. You love the spotlight...and our crewmates love you.
You know Valore's head-over-heels for you, right? She was so worried about you while we were gone.
You're too lovable for your own good, Meia. I think a lot of our pilots like how cold you are with them!
Do you have any idea how many of our crewmates would kill to see you zip that thing off up close and personal?
Hey, I pay you a compliment, and you get all snotty with me? I didn't think I'd ever get over the marble skin--oh, and it looks like we'll be seeing a lot more of it.
Ugh, you're so rude. Couldn't you have been programmed to return compliments? I guess if your dress is already coming off, you don't waste time with decorum.
Oh, excuse me for not ignoring your gray skin as I compliment your looks. Most girls like talking about themselves--you'd rather just throw your dress off.
What a sad display. You shame your home planet!
Where's your focus? Strategy is key! That's how you sound, Meia.
Dita would bring that cute little crop-top jacket of hers...and probably that alien antennae headband, too.
What's this? Did the Earth girl learn how to have fun?
Finally, something worthwhile. I'm busy, Meia, go thank her.
I'll show whatever you want...it's my duty as a Mejarian to pry you away from these beastly Earth men.

Happy? Now I have to readjust my armbands.
So long, ladies. I'll tell Meia you weren't much of a challenge, so she doesn't get disappointed.
I think I did pretty well. Maybe I've got what it takes to finally beat Meia.
Another point for Mejare! Well, Mejarian pirates.
Aww, and you were so close to seeing my beautiful breasts!
Couldn't quite get me out of my dress! Maybe next time, dearie.
I don't even mind being naked, and that's all you could muster. Oh, well.
Hah! Wait till I tell Meia I won. Too bad she won't believe me.
You were thiiiiis close to getting me naked, too. Another point for Mejare!
Well, you didn't get to see my whole body, but I still think you enjoyed the view.
Well, I could tell Meia I won, but she'd just criticize me for being pushed this far.
My breasts came out to play. Everyone's a winner!
I swear I wasn't even trying. Guess my chest was just too distracting.
Way to fizzle out. I was barely paying attention anymore.
I guess the glory of my nude body was just too much for you to concentrate.
I won the game, but I'd say you're all the real winners.
Now I'm all hot and bothered, and I don't even get to masturbate. Looks like Barnette has a rough night ahead of her.
Jeez, my body really is distracting.
You saw my nude body...but not all of it, if you follow.
No masturbation from me, but this was plenty of eye candy, right?
Good job, Meia. You wear even less than I do, and you pulled off another win!
Oh, this won't do at all. You're the most sexually-frustrated girl here, Meia!
There goes my dependable leader. Even when you spring public masturbation threats on her, she doesn't lose her cool.
I know I hid the rule from you, but I really think you could've used a thrill like spreading yourself out for a crowd.
Damn--my whole plan was to have you lose. Now I have to make you masturbate for the Dread team.
I should've known you'd win no matter how little you wore. Strong, smart Meia Gisborn handles whatever the world throws at her.
You see that, Earthlings? Our squadron leader can walk in here with a bodysuit and win--she's one tough cookie!
I would expect nothing less from stone-cold Meia Gisborn. Pile on the clothes, throw new rules at her--she can take it all!
Well, you won as usual, but I hope this was still fun, Meia. We learned all about Earth, right?
Well, look at that--you didn't even have to masturbate after that scare. But I bet the idea was thrilling, right?
Even without spreading your legs, stripping must have made you feel a little sexier...right?
I think we made a good impression on these Earthlings, right, Meia? Look how we won no problem!
Meia's one of the toughest Mejarians around, planet Earth--and one of the prettiest, too. I'm sure everyone saw that tonight.
Thanks for coming here with me, Meia. There's no one on the ship I'd trust more.
My Barnette will be so jealous of you...I'll have to calm her down, if you know what I mean.
Congratulations, ~player~. Enjoy your sexual frustration!
Nice meeting you, ~player~. You should come aboard the Nirvana sometime.
See you soon, ~player~. Mejare's lovely this time of year...well, sort of.
Public nudity is so embarrassing. What will I tell my Barnette, with all these strangers having ogled me?
Just you wait. I went easy on you and held back the Mejarian wits.
You got lucky, ~player~. I lost interest in the cards after a while.
Congratulations, you've outplayed Jura Basil Elden. That's more than Mejare's military can say.
Wow, am I feeling refreshed! This was a great idea. Toodle--oo!
This game was every bit as fun as I thought it'd be. And I gave you a great show, right?
Sorry for jerking you around at first, but you made me pay for it, right?
I hope I've improved everyone's opinions of Magno Vivan's Mejarian pirates...or at least their bodies.
Be glad it was me here and not Meia. All you'd have gotten there is some nasty glares.
...Why didn't you tell me we had to masturbate, Jura?
Ehehehe... it seems my boss is here to take me home.
O-oh, hi, Meia! Did you...enjoy the little extra rule this place has?
There you are. You lost, too...at least you knew what the consequences were.
Meia! This cutie here is m-my boss...who I didn't tell about the whole masturbation thing.
Oh, Meia! Good to...see you. I guess you lost too, huh? ...Meet any cute girls?
M-M-Meia! What a pleasant surprise! ...Did you find a girlfriend?
It seems Mejare's crown jewel now has a few chips in it. I hope Earth doesn't look down upon us for that.
Am I still just as beautiful without the thrill of the tease? It's OK, be honest with me.
You were all such welcoming hosts for a foreigner like me! Remember that I love reading my fan mail!
Yeah, we're a little too busy fending off your organ harvesters to bother with invading you.
Hey, remember who's the aggressor here, Earth-man. Or have you all been told we're hogging up your uteri?
First he makes me masturbate for him without returning the favor, and then he calls me aggressive. Men are impossible.
Yeah, yeah, laugh it up, organ-harvester. I don't appreciate being called aggressive by the aggressors.
I don't know, Sola, I seem to have been humiliated in fron of hostile aliens. But I'm glad you think I'm cool.
Awwww! Well, I think you're cute as a button, Sola! Get yourself a girlfriend with those poker skills!
Thanks, dearie! If you could strip a cunning pilot like me, I say invite a girl you like to another game!
Cool? I get "beautiful" a lot from the other pilots, but nobody ever calls me cool! I like you, Sola.
Sure, Zizou. Whatever that means.
Couldn't that apply to any of us? Or are you calling me easy, you little skank?
Very funny, Miss Magic. You probably just magicked aces for yourself because you're a sore loser.
I'm just an easygoing girl in general, Zizou! When I'm not piloting my Dread against deadly alien robots, that is.
My Barnette will be so jealous of you...I'll have to calm her down, if you know what I mean.
Congratulations, ~name~. Enjoy your sexual frustration!
Nice meeting you, ~name~. You should come aboard the Nirvana sometime.
See you soon, ~name~. Mejare's lovely this time of year...well, sort of.
Public nudity is so embarrassing. What will I tell my Barnette, with all these strangers having ogled me?
Just you wait. I went easy on you and held back the Mejarian wits.
You got lucky, ~name~. I lost interest in the cards after a while.
Congratulations, you've outplayed Jura Basil Elden. That's more than Mejare's military can say.
Wow, am I feeling refreshed! This was a great idea. Toodle--oo!
This game was every bit as fun as I thought it'd be. And I gave you a great show, right?
Sorry for jerking you around at first, but you made me pay for it, right?
I hope I've improved everyone's opinions of Magno Vivan's Mejarian pirates...or at least their bodies.
Be glad it was me here and not Meia. All you'd have gotten there is some nasty glares.
...Why didn't you tell me we had to masturbate, Jura?

There you are. You lost, too...at least you knew what the consequences were.
Meia! This cutie here is m-my boss...who I didn't tell about the whole masturbation thing.

M-M-Meia! What a pleasant surprise! ...Did you find a girlfriend?

scene.directive: Hel-loooo!
Come on inside!
I've been waiting for you, ~name~...
...And so has my girlfriend, Barnette Orangello. Don't try to rhyme that.
This is the man, Jura? He doesn't look all that special to me.
Oh, but he's got that special something I've been looking for, darling...
You mean, he's handsome?
Yes.
Now then, ~name~, did you enjoy your little tour of the Nirvana?
She's a magnificent ship. And I picked out the name myself...
...The commander picked out the name.
...And everyone loved it!
You're a lucky man, you know.
After some careful consideration, I've decided you're going the be the man-Oma of my child!
...Oh, right, you don't know what that means. What's your Earth word for it?
Ah, yes. Father!
Don't worry, I'm not going to make you raise her.
I wouldn't trust a man around something that delicate anyway...besides me.
See, Mejare is nothing but women. If I have a baby with a man, it'll propel me straight into Mejarian superstardom!
So I need your seed to give me that beautiful child. And I know a fun way to do that!
Now, I'd never be so cruel as to do this behind my darling's back.
Nor would I force her to just sit here and watch you ravish me.
So she'll be joining in on our fun tonight! Men are into that, right?
...I don't know about this, Jura.
Oh, come on, honey, it'll be fun!
Earth women must keep men around for a reason.
No, I mean...you know.
It's just one baby, sweetie...just to make me famous. Don't you want your darling to get the fame she deserves?
Besides...the next one will be ours.
Wha--I--we're starting a family now?
That's how much I love you, dear.
Listen up, ~name~! Time is of the essence.
Normally I'd opt for some foreplay, but you've got a job to do, and it's making both of us happy.
Especially Barnette over here. She's a real saint for letting me do this, after all.
Don't you dare--do anything funny to her. I have a gun collection.
Such a sweetheart.
Ah, there's the man of the hour!
And he's standing at attention for us. What a gentleman!
I'm still not sold on these tube-things...
That's OK, sweetie. He doesn't need to sell it to us. We're pirates...
So we take whatever we want.
Agh!
Mmm!
Oh, yes!
That's it, ~name~! Give it to me!
S-so deep inside...men are so beastly!
Oh, I'm overwhelmed! These tubes--they're fantastic!
...I'm not feeling very involved.
Uh...sorry, honey.
Your seed takes more effort to coax out than I thought it would, ~name~.
Luckily, I have some help this evening...
I can't believe this...fighting alongside men is bad enough, but sleeping with them?
Oh, shut up, you're having fun.
These tubes are such a blast to play with! Men are like living, breathing sex toys.
Don't say I never did anything for you, Jura.
What, indulge your curiosity about our alien friends along with me?
Our bodies cry out for these things...
Ooh, I just remembered what I wanted to try!
I saw this paizuri thing in a book and absolutely fell in love with the idea!
Tell me, ~name~, how does it feel to be between the loveliest set of breasts in the galaxy?
Those poor flat-chested Earth girls could never make this happen for you...
Eek!
O-oh, this must be your seed!
Well, this is wasteful. Don't you have to cum inside me to get me pregnant?
I can't believe Earth women have any children at all when it's this messy.
We Mejarians just head down to the nice doctor and ask her to splice our eggs together.
Come here, Barnette...my darling.
This is the taste of a man...
Shame on you for wasting precious seed like that, ~name~.
A-are you really...do I have to do it? It's so weird-looking...
I know you've got some kind of refractive period, or whatever it's called...
So sit tight while I do a lover's duty. And once you're ready again...
I think Barnette deserves her turn.
Some time later...
Agh! N-ngh! T-this thing--
Incredible, isn't it? So fleshy and turgid...
I knew you two would warm up to each other.
It--it actually does feel good...
I told you!
...Go faster.
Feels so warm--I don't--
Wait a second...
Did you just...?
Ohhh, you idiot!
You're supposed to be getting me pregnant!
J-Jura...did he--?
Is it really so hard to shoot that stuff where you're supposed to for once?
I-inside...me?
I swear! You try to do something nice, and people just disappoint you.
Well, Mr. Earth-man, I hope you're proud of yourself.
You've managed to waste every drop of seed you spurted out, and thus wasted my evening in the process.
I always get what I want. One way or another, some of that stuff is ending up inside me...
I don't care how long it takes!
The Nirvana...
Far in the future.
Why, hello there, ~name~!
I'm so glad you could grace the Nirvana this evening.
Welcome to the mess hall! Dinner's almost ready.
I hope the guards didn't give a sweet thing like you too hard of a time.
I told them I was bringing a visitor aboard, and they usually take care of my wishes.
Just be glad you're not a man, or things would've been much uglier.
I'm so thrilled to see your pretty face again--and this time, you're not forcing me to strip.
Baring my beautiful body was so humiliating!
But I'm forgiving, and you're gorgeous, especially for an Earth girl.
So let's sit down and get to know each other as the food comes out.
Ohhh, there she is!
~name~, this is my lovely girlfriend I was going on about--Barnette Orangello!
Hello, ~name~. Nice to meet an Earth girl who's not trying to kill us.
Now, I know Barnette's not quite as tall or voluptuous as I am, but she's just so adorably cute!
Not to mention a skilled pilot--and a lovely cook!
It isn't much, but I used what ingredients we had.
Nonsense! I love it when we can have some warm, savory stew and cuddle up together.
Now...where were we?
So, ~name~, you're an intelligent woman. You beat me at poker, after all.
Have you guessed why I, the crown jewel of Mejare, would invite an Earth girl all the way here?
Well, you see, Mejare is a planet solely of women, as I've said.
But in time, with this crew in the public eye...it'll start to warm up to men.
I may be a lowly pirate at the moment, but if I become the first Mejarian to have a baby with a man, I'll be a superstar!
A celebrity! Mabe even a model! Everyone will admire my beauty--you're a woman, you understand.
But there's one problem.
I can't seduce a man for the life of me!
I approach them, I flirt with them, I have Barnette make them delicious food--all they do is run and hide!
It's not my fault--I didn't grow up around any!
That's why you're here, Earth-girl.
A dashing thing like you--you must be popular with the male species, aren't you?
I was kind enough to invite you here and feed you. So go on...share your secrets with this poor Mejarian woman.
How do I court a man?
...What?
What do you mean, you're into women?
Is that why you accepted my invitation?
The hopes of some sexual romp with me?
Oh, you've got to be kidding!
I go to Earth and back looking for advice, and the girl I find might as well be from Mejare!
You're useless to me! If you can't help me find a man, then go on and get out of here!
J-Jura...!
What?
H-hey, don't give me an attitude!
Why shouldn't I? The whole evening is wasted!
So you're going to be rude to me and ~name~? You picked her!
Forgive me for assuming a woman who lives with men would be interested in them!
Yeah, w-well...I don't like this whole man-chasing thing, anyway!
Oh, this again? It's just to make me famous!
I--I don't believe you anymore when you say that!
U-uh...
How do I know you're not gonna just dump me once you find a man?
Barne--
You didn't even tell me you were going to that strip bar! And now you're yelling at me!
C-c'mon, honey, don't cry...I'm sorry...
hic Prove it!
Uh...
...You're right, Barnette. I've been ignoring you.
I think it's time we rekindled our romance...with a little spice.
hic H-huh...?
~name~! I was so very rude to you. Any woman-loving woman is an ally to planet Mejare.
W-what're you--
And nothing inspires romance like a little jealousy.
Let's all ditch this cold cafeteria and head someplace cozier.
Jura...?
Specifically, my quarters...we have a treasured guest from Earth, after all.
Ngh--J-Jura...!
Shh...I need to make this all up to my darling.
Ah...m-mgh...
I'm sorry for yelling earlier...
No, I deserved it. I can't believe I made a cute thing like you cry--it doesn't suit you!
The Barnette I fell in love with is a tough, no-nonsense girl...
Just sit back and watch for now, ~name~. Barnette and I have never had an audience before.
You can join in when the womanly lust overcomes you.
Mm!
Shh...there you go. There you go...
Mmnh...
Oh, I love the little sounds you make! Isn't she adorable, ~name~?
C-c'mon, don't embarrass me...
Ahhn...
L-lemme do you, Jura...
After how I acted? Well, if you insist...
There...
Mm...I do enjoy being serviced. One day we'll be rich enough for that.
Yeah...a penthouse in the capital somewhere.
Maybe I can be famous for my beauty alone...maybe.
Hm?
Oh...
I think ~name~ is feeling left out. You don't mind extending a little hospitality to our guest, do you?
...No. It's OK.
Well then! Let's all get to know each other.
Why don't we have a little free-form petting, Earth-girl? Service us both...
Mm...
Oh!
Y-you weren't kidding...you do love the curves of a woman's body!
A-agh...
You're pretty good at this...
What's Earth like? Nice and blue, I hear?
Ohh, I made a big scene earlier...I just worry Jura's not interested in me anymore.
I mean, she's so gorgeous that she could have whoever she wants...
Mm...
...You like men's guns? I have a Calico pistol in my room.
Hey, don't ignore me completely! Are you two falling in love?
Eep! Oh, ~name~...you're so dirty!
Barnette and I are sweet, wholesome girls, you know...!
Jura...
Nnm!
This isn't how I thought dinner was gonna go...
Mmgh!
Ooh~
~name~!
Eep!
Ahhn...
A-are you ah feeling better, honey? Now that ~name~ is here to please us?
Oh, I owe you an apology, too, ~name~...
You've been such a good sport about all this!
Aren't Barnette and I beautiful?
How mmnh lucky you ended up getting the sexual romp you wanted!
Hah...hah...
Another woman seeing us at our most private...
It reminds me of when we first fell in love!
T-the asteroid field, you mean?
Of course! Trapped in low orbit, just the two of us surviving together as the crew searched for us...
That's when I knew you'd always be there for me, sweetie.
J-Jura...
There we go ignoring our guest again! Come here, ~name~...
Mm...ah...
This is a mm pretty romantic gesture nnm on Mejare, you know!
I don't know how you mmf Earth girls look at it...
Jura...you haven't done this for me in a while...
Hm? Well, how about it, ~name~?
Mm...
Ahn...d-don't stop...
What do you think, seeing my Barnette up close, tasting her?
Did I pick a good Oma for my daughters?
H-huh?
Come on, let's go a little faster. She deserves it...
Ah!
Mgh!
Gah--
Jura...!
Shh...
I'm sorry for before.
Mmnh...!
Oh?
She likes that, ~name~--I can tell from her voice.
Cum for us whenever you're ready, honey...
Nnnh!
Ohh, there you go!
I always feel proud of myself, making fiery Barnette Orangello squeal like that.
Of course, I had help this time!
Thanks so much, ~name~. I think you helped this Mejarian rediscover the woman's touch a little.
Yeah...it was fun meeting an Earth girl. Even if this was kind of awkward.
I swear we don't invite strangers here for sex.
Uh, Jura--?
Ohhhh, Barnette, I love you!
Let's get married!
M-married? Hey, let's think about this--!
Life's too short to worry!
Toodle-oo, ~name~!
You're going to make a girl very happy one day!
...Might I suggest Meia?
